title: "You are not alone." - Star Guardian skins incoming!

replies.body: {{champion:103}} skin incoming
I hope so.  I didn't like Arcade and I'm waiting to throw money at an Ahri skin I like.
the Arcade skin line is awesome
I liked most of the new arcade skins, but not Ahri's.  Her log in music was nice, but that was all I liked about it.
she just got one, it isnt gunna be her :p
{{champion:89}}  just got a skin so *extremely* unlikely
It was a 750 skin with little to no changes at all
it was still literally last patch...
And it's still barely even worth being called a "skin" lol
you kidding? the skin is great lol.
I disagree

Just because she got a skin last patch does not mean she can't be a Star Guardian.

Could be a case like Sailor Uranus or Neptune, in that she comes in a bit later.
well she could be later sure, im not denying that, but she *just* got a skin so she for sure wont be in this batch.

http://i.imgur.com/GoF1joK.jpg

RITO PLZ

http://grabilla.com/06910-485e5905-d874-41d8-963e-86841b0d5d37.png

With our powers combined, BOT LANE WILL BE _**FABULOUS**!_
PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE
any one else notice the cat on the tube slide?

I echo Ralanr's sentiment; Star Guardian Poppy better be a thing. I NEED IT.

Also if Irven's release skin is Star Guardian I'm going to laugh so hard. That'd be amazing.

Some of the people looking at leaks and stuff from some eerily accurate person said Janna, Lulu, Poppy and Jinx, with all being 1350 aside from Jinx who got 1820.

Honestly I have no idea about the veracity of any of that but legendary Jinx skin YESSSS.  Her Star Guardian skin concept was made by fans ages ago and has been on all chat and everything, so I think that at least that part of it will be accurate.  I figured she might need to get a legendary to justify something that hyped and to add particles to her abilities.  If it is I will be physically incapable of not buying it.
Sailor MOON Diana {{champion:131}}

Star Guardian Urgot anyone?

But in all seriousness, Syndra would be awesome.
But i'm down for anything at this point XD
Praying to god it be quinn.
Stars... Stars are eternal{{champion:44}}
Star guardian Urgot, Braum and Taric please!
I hope they go big with these skins, I don't want them to be 750 rp. I want really cool particles to go with these.
